title: thin sans
content:
I didn't do it. The client used the font, converted it to paths and now doesn't remember which font they used...

I think the "r" and the "t" are the tells, but I can't place it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224013im_/http:/typophile.com/files/simmon_kourtis_final_logo_5959.jpg)
author: phrostbyte64
